# packages/adapter-rust/vendor/codelldb/linux-arm64/lldb/lib/python3.12/site-packages/pip/_vendor/tomli/_re.py
@source-hash: 75b8e0e428594f6d
@generated: 2026-02-09T18:01:00Z

## Core Purpose
Regular expression utilities for parsing TOML numeric, datetime, and time literals into Python objects. Part of the `tomli` TOML parser library.

## Key Regex Patterns
- **`_TIME_RE_STR` (L17)**: Base pattern for time format matching (HH:MM:SS with optional microseconds)
- **`RE_NUMBER` (L19-37)**: Matches TOML numbers including hex (0x), binary (0b), octal (0o), decimal integers, and floats with optional underscores
- **`RE_LOCALTIME` (L38)**: Compiled time pattern matcher
- **`RE_DATETIME` (L39-49)**: Matches ISO 8601 datetime formats with optional timezone offsets

## Core Functions
- **`match_to_datetime(match)` (L52-84)**: Converts RE_DATETIME matches to `datetime.datetime` or `datetime.date` objects, handling timezones (UTC, offset, or local)
- **`cached_tz(hour_str, minute_str, sign_str)` (L87-95)**: LRU-cached timezone factory for offset timezones to avoid repeated object creation
- **`match_to_localtime(match)` (L98-101)**: Converts RE_LOCALTIME matches to `datetime.time` objects
- **`match_to_number(match, parse_float)` (L104-107)**: Converts RE_NUMBER matches to appropriate numeric types (int/float)

## Dependencies
- Standard library: `datetime`, `functools.lru_cache`, `re`, `typing`
- Internal: `._types.ParseFloat` type alias

## Architecture Notes
- Uses verbose regex patterns with comments for maintainability
- Timezone handling distinguishes between UTC (Z suffix), offset (+/-HH:MM), and local time
- Number parsing delegates float handling to configurable `ParseFloat` callable
- Performance optimization via LRU cache for timezone objects
- Microsecond precision handling with left-padding for consistent 6-digit format
